title: Create a Cross-Sell Offer on Product Page
description: On the product page for a digital camera, the system should display a 'Frequently Bought Together' section with a memory card and a camera bag.

tasks.description: When a customer visits the digital camera product page, identify the product.
Retrieve the list of manually curated or automatically generated cross-sell items for that camera.
tasks.expected_outcome: System retrieves the SKUs for the appropriate memory card and camera bag.

tasks.description: Display these items on the page, allowing the customer to add all three to the cart with one click.
tasks.expected_outcome: The UI correctly displays the cross-sell items with a bundle-add option.
